doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 27 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 144[Air Date: 4/2/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 27 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 144[Air Date: 4/2/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. New Hampshire votes against discriminatory blood bill 2. Several men press brutality charges against Chicago police department after a gar bar raidCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals3. Philadelphia police officers extort money from local gay bars, FBI sting operation reveals4. Zelda Rubinstein ads4. "The Times of Harvey Milk" wins academy award, includes clip from film and award showCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper5. New Jersey gay-discrimination6. Texas senate proposes anti-gay employment discrimination bill, other Texas bills7. New York State Gay and Lesbian lobbyists hire Desire Velarde as part-time lobbyist8. New York State Lobby Day in Albany9. As primary approaches, Carol Greitzer and David Rothenberg debate for City Council 3rd District position10. Sports11. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Bernard Granville, Insurance Broker, discusses comprehensive policies and misapprehensions12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media reports/current events/cultureCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine2. DreamboysCOMMERCIAL: "Lust in the Dust"3. Interview with Quentin Crisp and Terry MillerCOMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity4. David Henderson in Dallas5. Closing credits
